basic.name: Arcane Flare (Q)
basic.description: Shoot a flare dealing 75 damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

basic.name: Polymorph (W)
basic.description: Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 30% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

basic.name: Pixie Dust (E)
basic.description: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.

basic.name: Hyper Shift (Z)
basic.description: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 25% of their maximum Health.

heroic.name: Blink Heal (R)
heroic.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200.Stores up to 2 charges.

heroic.name: Emerald Wind (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 damage and pushing enemies away.

trait.name: Soothing Mist (T)
trait.description: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 110 every 4 seconds

1.name: Greater Polymorph
1.description: Passive: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. If Brightwing hits an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center within 2 seconds of being Polymorphed, then reduce Polymorph's cooldown by 7 seconds and gain 50 Mana.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

4.name: Dream Shot
4.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Magic Spit
4.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 4 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Flare
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

7.name: Peekaboo!
7.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 Shield for 4 seconds and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

7.name: Critical Mist
7.description: Soothing Mist heals allied Heroes for 165. Increase this healing by 140% if Soothing Mist removed a disabling effect from that ally.

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200.Stores up to 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 damage and pushing enemies away.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

13.name: Safety Dust
13.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Soothing Mist and Blink Heal heal allies with an active Pixie Dust for 75% more.

13.name: Pixie Power
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

16.name: Hush!
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Phase Out
16.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Invisible Friends
20.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing and her Heroic targets for 9 seconds, and they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 25 health per second.Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

20.name: Intensive Winds
20.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.name: Speedy Dragon
20.description: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed. Reduce Phase Shift's cast time by 1 second.

20.name: Faerie Protector
20.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.Passive: Pixie Dust always bounces back and applies to Brightwing.
